name: mable
notes:
> i have created a full video tutorial (master class) for this pattern. [you can find it here.][1] 

**details**

* pattern consists of 24 rounds.

* level is “intermediate.”

* stitches/terms: sk, slst, ch, sc, hdc, dc, tc, improved csdc, bp, fp, cluster, popcorn, sc2tog, small picot.

----------------------------------------------

**languages**

this pattern is available in english, spanish and russian. 

if you are able and desire to translate the pattern into your native language, [please use this form to contact me][2]. only authorized translations are permitted.

* *russian language translation provided by ula tomaszewska and tested by tatyana norri and наталья коваленко.*

* *spanish/espanol language translation and testing provided by virginia padilla and tere gomis.*


-------------------------------------------

**community**

[join our discussion and support group for designs by grace fearon on facebook.][3]

join our [discord channel][4]!

*thank you so very much to my testers on this pattern: marla austin, cille heckenbach, juanita carol, jena duncan, and siva oduri.*
